General_Config.ValidSourceSystems: SQLServer, APS, SYNAPSE, TERADATA, NETEZZA, SNOWFLAKE, ORACLE, DB2

VersionQuery.Query: SELECT  InfoData AS Version FROM    DBC.DBCInfoV WHERE   InfoKey = 'VERSION';
SELECT VERSION as VERSION FROM SYS.PRODUCT_COMPONENT_VERSION;
SELECT service_level FROM TABLE (sysproc.env_get_inst_info()) as INSTANCEINFO;

DBListingQuery.Query: select DATNAME as Name from SYSTEM.._T_DATABASE Where DATNAME NOT IN ('MASTER_DB','SYSTEM')

SELECT distinct TRIM(databasename) as name FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE databasename NOT IN ('console', 'DBC', 'dbcmngr', 'LockLogShredder', 'SQLJ', 'SysAdmin', 'SYSBAR', 'SYSJDBC', 'SYSLIB', 'SYSSPATIAL', 
				'SystemFe', 'SYSUDTLIB', 'SYSUIF', 'Sys_Calendar', 'TDQCD', 'TDStats', 'tdwm', 'TD_SERVER_DB', 'TD_SYSFNLIB', 'TD_SYSGPL','TD_SYSXML',
				'PDCRAdmin','PDCRCanary1M','PDCRINFO','PDCRSTG','PDCRCanary0M','PDCRCanary2M','PDCRCanary3M','PDCRADM','PDCRAccess','PDCRTPCD','PDCRCanary4M','PDCRDATA','TDMaps')
				ORDER BY databasename;
select name from sys.databases where name not in ('master','tempdb','stagedb', 'msdb', 'model', 'ReportServer$%');
select name from sys.databases where name not in ('master','tempdb','stagedb', 'msdb', 'model', 'ReportServer$%')
select name from sys.databases where name not in ('master','tempdb','stagedb', 'msdb', 'model', 'ReportServer$%') and user_access_desc = 'multi_user' and state_desc='online'

TableListingQuery.Query: SELECT table_name FROM user_tables ORDER BY table_name;

SELECT TRIM(TABLENAME) as name, TRIM(databasename) as database_name ,TRIM(databasename) as SchemaName   FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('T')
				and database_name  ='@DBName'
				AND databasename NOT IN ('console', 'DBC', 'dbcmngr', 'LockLogShredder', 'SQLJ', 'SysAdmin', 'SYSBAR', 'SYSJDBC', 'SYSLIB', 'SYSSPATIAL', 
				'SystemFe', 'SYSUDTLIB', 'SYSUIF', 'Sys_Calendar', 'TDQCD', 'TDStats', 'tdwm', 'TD_SERVER_DB', 'TD_SYSFNLIB', 'TD_SYSGPL','TD_SYSXML',
				'PDCRAdmin','PDCRCanary1M','PDCRINFO','PDCRSTG','PDCRCanary0M','PDCRCanary2M','PDCRCanary3M','PDCRADM','PDCRAccess','PDCRTPCD','PDCRCanary4M','PDCRDATA','TDMaps')
				ORDER BY databasename, TABLENAME;
Select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id and t.object_id not in (select object_id from sys.external_tables) order by t.name;
select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName, t.is_external from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id order by t.name;
select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName, t.is_external from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id order by t.name;
select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName, t.is_external from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id order by t.name;

ViewListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('V') and databasename = '@DBName'
select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName, t.is_external from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id order by t.name;
select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName, t.is_external from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id order by t.name;

ProcedureListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('P') and databasename = '@DBName'

ProcedureExtListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('E') and databasename = '@DBName'

MacroListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('M') and databasename = '@DBName'

FunctionListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('A', 'B') and databasename = '@DBName'

FunctionExtListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('F', 'R', 'S') and databasename = '@DBName'

TriggerListingQuery.Query: SELECT TRIM(databasename) DBName, TRIM(TABLENAME) Name, TRIM(databasename) SchemaName	FROM dbc.tablesV WHERE tablekind IN ('G') and databasename = '@DBName'
